Interface IDataBase

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DataBase

    public interface IDataBase
    The database interface that stores the news article and the terms in them.
    Author:
    Ji Xiayan

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Fetch the news related to the keyword in the database

      Initialize a stop list to filter out the meaningless word.

      Store all news from a new web site URL(e.g.
      void updateDataBase()
      Update the database so that the db Map maps each keyword to a heap of new articles.

           throws java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • updateDataBase

        void updateDataBase()
        Update the database so that the db Map maps each keyword to a heap of new articles.

      • fetch

        java.util.List<FeedMessage> fetch(java.lang.String keyWord)
        Fetch the news related to the keyword in the database
        Parameters:
        keyWord - the keyword of interest
        Returns:
        a list of new related to this topic

      • store

        int store(Feed feed)
        Store all news from a new web site URL(e.g. CNN) into the database.
        Parameters:
        feed - all news from a particular news source.
        Returns:
        the number of news successfully stored
